name: Cubes Control
description:
Immerse yourself in a new and exciting game - Cubes Control!

Your goal is to merge all the cubes into one.

Manage all the cubes at the same time, move and combine the same numbers to get the maximum value!



Features

Unique and relaxing gameplay;
Simple and pleasing graphics;
Diverse and unusual levels;
Intuitive control;
A worthy challenge for your ingenuity.



On the way to the maximum value, interesting levels, tricky puzzles that require non-standard solutions and a lot of fun await you !

Once you start merging cubes, you won't be able to stop!
